validated=(value)

REQUIRED summary: States whether the email address must have been validated by the account owner for the message to be sent. remarks: If true, Microsoft HealthVault will ensure that the specified account‘s email address has been validated by the account owner before sending the message. If true, and the address hasn‘t been validated, an error will be returned. value is a String
